definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: favour, supplication for favour;—[[תְּחִנַּת]] Jos 11:20 + 4 t.; cstr. [[תְּחִנָּתִי]] 1Ki 8:30, 1Ki 8:52, 1Ki 8:52; [[תְּחִנּׁתֵיהֶס]] Je 37:20 + 5 t.; [[תְּחִנּׂתֵיהֶם]] 2Ch 6:39 etc. + 10 t. sf.;—
favour, shewn by Israel Jos 11:29 (D); [[מאת יהוה]] Ezr 9:8.

supplication for favour, from God 1Ki 8:52, 1Ki 8:52, 2Ch 33:13, Ps 119:170; ‖ [[תְּפִלָּה]] 1Ki 8:28 = 2Ch 6:19, Ps 6:10, Ps 55:2; [[תחנה]] ([[ו]]) [[תפלה]] 1Ki 8:38, 1Ki 8:45, 1Ki 8:49, 1Ki 8:54 = 2Ch 6:29, 2Ch 6:35, 2Ch 6:39, 1Ki 9:3; [[אשׁר התפלל]] ´[[ת]] 1Ki 8:30 (= [[תַּחֲנוּן]] 2Ch 6:21); [[לִפְנֵי]] ´[[תִּפּׂלּ ת]] let the supplication fall before, Yahweh Je 36:7, the king Je 37:20, Jeremiah Je 42:2; [[לפני]] ´[[הִפִּיל ת]] present supplication before, Yahweh Je 42:9, Da 9:20, the king Je 38:26.
